item.title: Continuous Delivery for Phonebot
item.description: Since creating Phonebot last month, I’ve been working on setting up a fully-automated build and deploy for the project. Using IBM DevOps Services, Phonebot now has “Continuous Delivery” enabled. When new code is commited to the external Github repository, the build service will perform the following tasks. Run Unit Tests and Code Lint Tools Deploy To Test Server Run Integration Tests Against Test Server Deploy To Production Each stage will only be executed if the following stage passes.
